name: Zect
description: Zect, a telegram userbot with MongoDB database

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get this value by running [python3 mysession.py] in Termux or local system.

DOWNLOAD_DIR.description: This is for the database account, you can obtain it from mongodb.com.

SUDO_USERS.description: Your heroku api key if using heroku.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your heroku app name if using heroku.
